long_description: This lightweight, compact Park chain tool is built to travel! Fits into any pocket or bike bag, yet performs like a shop-quality instrument. Features a fine thread, special "V"-shaped handle for light weight, and a super strong, replaceable pin to make chain removal easy. Works on any chain, including Hyperglide. Has a built-in shelf for loosening tight links.
short_description: This lightweight, compact Park chain tool is built to travel! Fits into any pocket or bike bag, yet performs like a shop-quality instrument.
